instructions.title: Task Instructions
instructions.description: Learn about task rules, rates, and important notes
instructions.payoutRulesDesc: Complete payout tasks to earn fee rewards
instructions.payoutRule1Desc: Each amount range requires completing a specified number of tasks daily to unlock payin task permissions for that range
instructions.payoutRule2Desc: Task amounts are divided into multiple ranges, including 100-500, 501-1000, etc., with different fee rates for each range
instructions.payoutRule3Desc: After claiming a task, payment must be completed within the specified time. Failure to complete on time will affect your account reputation score
instructions.payoutRule4Desc: After payment is completed, the system will automatically verify the transaction status. Fee rewards will be issued immediately upon successful verification
instructions.payinRulesDesc: Complete payin tasks to earn order amounts
instructions.payinRule1Desc: Only after completing the minimum payout task requirements for each amount range can you unlock payin task permissions for that range
instructions.payinRule2Desc: After receiving a payin order, immediately display the QR code or account information to the payer
instructions.payinRule3Desc: Confirm receipt of funds within 1-3 minutes after receiving payment. Late confirmation will affect your account reputation score
instructions.payinRule4Desc: Payin order amounts can be used for withdrawals or to continue completing payout tasks
instructions.feeRatesDesc: Different amount ranges correspond to different fee rates
instructions.payinFeeInfo: Payin tasks require no fee payment. You receive 100% of the order amount as income
instructions.note1: Please complete tasks within the specified time after claiming to avoid timeouts affecting account reputation
instructions.note2: Keep payment receipts after payment completion in case they are needed
instructions.note3: If you encounter payment failures or other issues, please contact customer service immediately
instructions.note4: After completing daily tasks, check your balance details promptly to confirm reward receipt
instructions.payinNote1: Please confirm receipt promptly after payin order funds arrive to avoid timeouts affecting account reputation
instructions.payinNote2: Before confirming receipt, verify the payment amount and payer information to ensure accuracy
instructions.payinNote3: If you encounter payment anomalies, keep chat records and transfer receipts, then contact customer service
instructions.payinNote4: Payin order amounts can be used for withdrawals or to continue completing payout tasks
instructions.faq1Question: How to get payin task permissions?
instructions.faq1Answer: You need to complete payout tasks first. Each amount range has minimum task requirements. Upon completion, you can unlock payin task permissions for that range.
instructions.faq2Question: What happens if a task times out?
instructions.faq2Answer: Task timeouts will lower your account reputation score. If your reputation score is too low, it may affect your task acquisition permissions.
instructions.faq3Question: When will fee rewards be credited?
instructions.faq3Answer: After payment is completed, the system will automatically verify the transaction status. Fee rewards will be credited immediately upon successful verification.
instructions.faq4Question: How long does it take for withdrawals to arrive?
instructions.faq4Answer: After submitting a withdrawal request, it is generally processed within 1-2 business days. Actual arrival time depends on bank processing speed.
instructions.faq5Question: How to improve account reputation score?
instructions.faq5Answer: Completing tasks on time, confirming receipts promptly, and maintaining good transaction records can improve your account reputation score.
instructions.needHelpDesc: If you have other questions, feel free to contact our customer service team
